title: Theoretical investigation of the excited-state intramolecular double proton transfer process of 2,2′-(benzo[1,2-d:4,5-d′]bis(thiazole)-2,6-diyl)diphenol
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26239-26245
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04553J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yongchao Hao, Xiaoran Li, Hongfang Li, Shanyan Chang, Jiangyu Zhang, Lili Dong
The investigation of the excited state intramolecular double proton transfer process of 2,2′-(benzo[1,2-d:4,5-d′]bis(thiazole)-2,6-diyl)diphenol in DCM proposes a stepwise ESIDPT mechanism.
